sentences.en: He is callous about the safety of his workers.
sentences.cn: 他对他工人的安全毫不关心.

sentences.en: He is callous and selfish and stupid.
sentences.cn: 他是个冷血动物,又自私又愚昧.

sentences.en: He made himself callous towards her.

sentences.cn: 她冷酷无情的态度引起我的反感.

sentences.en: His behavior on that occasion was extremely callous.
sentences.cn: 对那件事他的行为确属无情.

sentences.en: His cruel and callous comments made me shiver.
sentences.cn: 他残酷无情的批评令我胆寒.

sentences.en: I don't wish to sound callous, but I am glad I wasn't here.
sentences.cn: 我不想让自己的话听上去麻木不仁，但我真的很庆幸我当时没在这儿。

sentences.en: It was not strange that constant repetition had left her a little callous.
sentences.cn: 毫不足怪,翻来覆去使她有些腻烦了.

sentences.en: Now I see that you are callous and treacherous.
sentences.cn: 现在我可看清了,你是个冷酷无情,居心叵测的家伙.

sentences.en: One might be outraged by his callous selfisness.
sentences.cn: 他的冷酷,自私能叫人气得火冒三丈.

sentences.en: She blazed into fury because of his callous injustice.
sentences.cn: 见他这样铁面无情,蛮不讲理,她不觉大为气愤.

sentences.en: She was selfish, arrogant and often callous.
sentences.cn: 她自私傲慢,而且往往冷酷无情.

sentences.en: Some of us backstairs crowd thought he was callous about Missy.
sentences.cn: 我们当中的一些仆人认为,他对米丝太无情.

sentences.en: The auto industry has often been arrogant, but it's not that callous.
sentences.cn: 汽车业人士常常是傲慢的, 但也不至于那么狠心肠.
沃尔登握了握他那长满老茧的手.

sentences.en: We were shocked at the callous disregard for human life.
sentences.cn: 我们对这种无视人类生命的冷漠感到震惊。

words.tran_cn: 冷酷无情地；麻木不仁地

变得冷酷无情；结茧；变硬

trans.tran_cn: 硬结的，长茧的，铁石心肠的，无情的
trans.tran_en: not caring that other people are suffering

trans.tran_cn: 使冷酷无情；使硬结；使生茧
